name: Alice and the Ring
description:
She said YES! And I've made a game where my fiancée Alice has to find all the diamonds of hers ring. But be careful the weather will change and will make your experience more difficult, and remember donuts are not your best friends.

This is a simple side-scroller game with procedural generation, finished after one year of study about game development from Quique Fdez Guerra (@CKGrafico) made with TypeScript, React and PhaserJS.

You can also play this game at https://alice.ckgrafico.com
